oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: Tamme (and possibly !nanni) gives words and sentences relating to many aspects of daily life in their country (mostly to do with food). Mention is also made of the name used by !nanni's and Tamme's people when speaking of the lion (its name is avoided by the !kun).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: plants and animals (and avoiding the lion's name)
